rescuecore2.misc.geometry
Class GeometryTools2D

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.misc.geometry.GeometryTools2D

public final class GeometryTools2D
extends java.lang.Object

A bunch of useful 2D geometry tools: finding line intersections, closest points and so on.

Field Summary

Field Detail

THRESHOLD

public static final double THRESHOLD
The threshold for equality testing in geometric operations. Lines will be considered parallel if the D factor is less than this; points will be considered equivalent if their position difference is less than this and so on.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getIntersectionPoint

public static Point2D getIntersectionPoint(Line2D l1,
                                           Line2D l2)
Find the intersection point of two lines.

Parameters:
l1 - The first line.
l2 - The second line.
Returns:
The intersection point of the two lines, or null if the lines are parallel.

getSegmentIntersectionPoint

public static Point2D getSegmentIntersectionPoint(Line2D l1,
                                                  Line2D l2)
Find the intersection point of two line segments.

Parameters:
l1 - The first line segment.
l2 - The second line segment.
Returns:
The intersection point, or null if the line segments are parallel or do not intersect.

parallel

public static boolean parallel(Line2D l1,
                               Line2D l2)
Are two lines parallel?

Parameters:
l1 - The first line.
l2 - The second line.
Returns:
true iff the lines are parallel (within tolerance). Direction does not matter; lines pointing in opposite directions are still parallel.

contains

public static boolean contains(Line2D line,
                               Point2D point)
Find out if a point is on a line.

Parameters:
line - The line to test.
point - The point to test.
Returns:
true iff the point is on the line (within tolerance).

positionOnLine

public static double positionOnLine(Line2D line,
                                    Point2D point)
Find out how far a point is along a line.

Parameters:
line - The line to test.
point - The point to test.
Returns:
The t value of the point along the line, or NaN if the point is not on the line.

clipToRectangle

public static Line2D clipToRectangle(Line2D line,
                                     double xMin,
                                     double yMin,
                                     double xMax,
                                     double yMax)
Clip a line to a rectangle.

Parameters:
line - The line to clip.
xMin - The lower X coordinate of the rectangle.
yMin - The lower Y coordinate of the rectangle.
xMax - The upper X coordinate of the rectangle.
yMax - The upper Y coordinate of the rectangle.
Returns:
A clipped line, or null if the line is outside the rectangle.
